array.name: AnatomicalPrecision
array.item: "During an Attack from this model enemy models suffer [-1] ARM."

array.name: AssistPrincess
array.item: "When making an Attack against an enemy model engaged by the named model, this model gains [+1] TAG and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: AttackSupportPrincess
array.item: "This model gains [+2] TAC while within [4\"] of the named friendly model."

array.name: Beserk
array.item: "During its activation, if this model damages an enemy model with an Attack, this model may make an additional Attack without spending Influence. This ability cannot generate a further additional Attack from itself."

array.name: BloodDance
array.item: "This model may make a [1\"] Dodge after causing damage to an enemy model that is suffering the bleed condition."

array.name: BurningPassion
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and to Playbook damage results against enemy models suffering the burning condition."

array.name: CharmedMale
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DEF agains each Attack or Character Play made against it by the named model type."

array.name: CrucialArtery
array.item: "When damaged by this model enemy models suffer the bleed condition."

array.name: DamagedTarget
array.item: "When this model declares a Charge against a damaged enemy model it gains [+0\",2\"] MOV"

array.name: DefenceSupportSpigot
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains +1 DEF."

array.name: EmpoweredVoice
array.item:
"Once per turn during this model's activation, choose a friendly guild model within [6"] to benefit from one of the following Empowered Voice effects. The chosen effect lasts until the end of the turn:

Speed: gain [+2"/+2"] MOV.
Strength: gain [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results.
Agility: gain [+1] DEF."

array.name: Floored
array.item: "This model gains [+2] TAC against models suffering the knocked-down condition."

array.name: FootballLegend
array.item: "While within this aura, friendly models gain [+1,+1\"] KICK."

array.name: Furious
array.item: "This model may Charge without spending Influence."

array.name: GetOverHereScum
array.item: "Once during this model's activation, if the named model is within [10\"] of this model, the named model may make a Dodge up to it's base-move towards the model"

array.name: GoalDefence
array.item: "Enemy models suffer [+1] TN to Shot attempts while this model is within [4\"] of a friendly goal-token"

array.name: GluttonousMass
array.item: "The first time each turn this model is hit by an enemy Attack or Character Play that targets this model, except while advancing, the Attack or Character Play is ignored."

array.name: Haemophilia
array.item: "While within this aura, enemy models do not remove the bleed condition in the Maintenance Phase"

array.name: LifeDrinker
array.item: "When this model damages one or more enemy models with an Attack or Play, it may recover [1] HP "

array.name: LovedCreature
array.item: "When this model suffers the taken-out condition as the result of an enemy Attack or Play, the friendly team gains [2] MP and for the remainder of the turn friendly models gain [+2] TAC and [+2\"/+2\"] MOV"

array.name: MagicalBrew
array.item: "Once per turn, during this models activation, it can remove all conditions currently on it.

array.name: ProtectedEsters
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains [+1] ARM."

array.name: Regenerate
array.item: "At the start of the Maintenance Phase, before conditions are resolved, this model may recover [2] HP."

array.name: RushKeeper
array.item: "While this model is within [4\"] of a friendly goal-token, when an enemy model ends its Advance within [6\"] of this model and this model is not engaged, this model may immediately make a Charge targetting the enemy model."

array.name: SelectiveBrewersButchersEngineersFishermen
array.item: "This model can also play for the named teams."

array.name: ShadowLike
array.item: "At the start of this model's activation, it may make a [2\"] Dodge"

array.name: ShoveTheBootIn
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results against models suffering the knocked-down condition"

array.name: SmellBlood
array.item: "This model gains [+0\"/+2\"] MOV when it performs a Charge against an enemy model suffering the bleed condition. When this model makes an Attack against an enemy model suffering the bleed condition, it gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results against that model."

array.name: TacticalAdviceScum
array.item: "During the Maintenance Phase, if the named model is within [4\"], this model gains [+1/+1] INF."

array.name: TacticalAdviceStave
array.item: During the Maintenance Phase, if the named model is within [4\"], this model gains [+1/+1] INF.

array.name: TheOwner
array.item: "While within this aura, friendly models gain [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results"

array.name: ToughHide
array.item: Enemy Plays that cause damage to, or Playbook damage results that hit this model are reduced by [-1] DMG.

array.name: UnpredictableMovement
array.item: "Once per turn, when an enemy model ends an Advance in this model's melee zone, this model may immediately make a [2\"] Dodge"

array.name: VolleyThreat
array.item: "While within [8\"] of the enemy goal-token, this model spends [1] less Momentum to make a Snap Shot!"

array.name: ExplosiveBrew
array.item: "When this model uses the Lob Barrel Character Play this turn, enemy models hit additionally suffer [2] DMG."

array.name: HumanBallOfFire
array.item: "Any model whose base is touched during this model\'s Advance suffer the burning condition. At the end of this model\'s activation it suffers [4] DMG."

array.name: IShootBetterAfterABeer
array.item: "This model gains [+1/+2] KICK. This model gains [+1] DEF against Parting Blow attacks."

array.name: OldJakes
array.item: This model may immediately allocate [2] Influence between friendly guild models within [4\"].

array.name: SanguinePool
array.item: "Enemy models that are suffering conditions and are within the pulse suffer [-4\"/-4\"] MOV and [1] DMG"

array.name: SoothingVoice
array.item: "Friendly models within the pulse recover [2] HP and remove any conditions currently on them."

array.name: TimesCalled
array.item: "Friendly models starting thier Advance within this aura gain [+2\"/+2\"] MOV.

array.name: TrueGrit
array.item: "Immediately remove all conditions from this model. This model gains [+2] TAC.

array.name: Exsanguinate
array.item: "Enemy models suffering the bleed condition within the pulse immediately suffer bleed damage."

array.name: ItsNotOverUntil
array.item: "This model may use Empowered Voice three times this turn."

array.name: GetEmLads
array.item: "While within this aura, friendly models gain [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results. Enemy models within this aura suffer [-1] ARM."

array.name: BallsGone
array.item: "Tackle the target enemy model. The ball-token may then be placed in possession of a friendly model within [4\"]."

array.name: BlastEarth
array.item: "All models hit suffer [2] DMG. This ongoing-effect AOE is rough-ground."

array.name: Blood
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers the bleed condition"

array.name: BloodRain
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [2] DMG. Enemy models within the pulse suffer the bleed condition."

array.name: BurnTheFloor
array.item: "Choose a terrain piece. All models within the terrain piece automatically suffer the burning condition. All models entering or ending their activation within the terrain piece suffer the burning condition."

array.name: Butchery
array.item: "Friendly models gain [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results against the target enemy model."

array.name: ChainGrab
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [4\"] Push directly towards this model.

array.name: CommandingAura
array.item: An Attack made against an enemy model within this aura gains [+1]TAC and [+1]DMG to Playbook damage results.

array.name: DirtyKnives
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-1] DEF, [1] DMG and the poison condition"

array.name: FireBlast
array.item: "All models hit suffer [2] DMG and the burning condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the burning condition. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: FlameJet
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [3] DMG and the burning condition."

array.name: GroundPound
array.item: "All other models within the pulse suffer a [2\"] Push directly away from this model, [2] DMG and the knocked-down condition."

array.name: LobBarrel
array.item: "All models hit suffer a [4\"] Push directly away from the centre of the AOE and the knocked-down condition. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: LongBomb
array.item: "If this model is in possession of the ball-token, choose a target-spot and scatter the ball from that location using the standard-scatter."

array.name: Molotov
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers the burning condition. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: MarkedTarget
array.item: Friendly models who declare a Charge against the affected enemy model gain [+0/+2] MOV. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: PainCircle
array.item: "All mdels hit suffer [1] DMG and the bleed condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the bleed condition. This Character Play may only be used once per turn"

array.name: RammingSpeed
array.item: "During this model\'s Advance, any enemy model whose base is touched suffers a [2\"] Push directly away. A model can only be affected by this Character Play once per turn."

array.name: RabidAnimal
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-4\"/-4\"] MOV and the poison condition"

array.name: ScythingBlow
array.item: "All models within this model\'s melee zone suffer [3] DMG."

array.name: SeismicKick
array.item: "When this model makes a KICK action it cannont be intercepted. All other models except the receiving model, on the ball-path from this KICK action suffer the knocked-down condition."

array.name: ThousandCuts
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-2] DEF and [1] DMG"

array.name: TooledUp
array.item: "Target friendly model gains [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: ToughSkin
array.item: "Target friendly model gains [+1] ARM. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: WheredTheyGo
array.item: "This model may make a [4\"] Dodge. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."
